personalInfo.name: Dewa Fakha Shiva
personalInfo.title: Project Manager at Flying Cape Technologies
personalInfo.bio: Leading cross-functional teams and delivering innovative tech solutions for 2+ years. Experienced in project management, customer requirement gathering, and collaborating with UI/UX, developers, and data analysts to bring products to life. Passionate about building innovative solutions using AI-assisted workflows and exploring the potential of Web3 technologies.

experience.description: Leading cross-functional teams to deliver tech solutions on schedule. Managing product delivery with UI/UX designers, developers, and data analysts.
Managed both internal product development and external customer projects. Led redesign efforts and created project timelines for optimal delivery coordination.
Led project scopes and objectives involving stakeholders. Organized internal resources and third-party vendors for seamless project execution while ensuring timely delivery within budget.

Provided technical consulting for sales teams, led implementation of new features, and handled customer requirement gathering for application configuration. Solved customer problems and improved product features.
Handled technical support for mobile devices, office inventory, and application setup for new customers. Prepared data for trial applications and managed customer technical needs.
